highlights: Contribute to the development and enhancement of the Workforce Management Software Application (WFM).
Handle feature implementations and resolve customer-reported bugs, ensuring high-quality product delivery.
Work on integrating third-party services by implementing key APIs and features, and maintaining their functionalities within the application.
Collaborate with teams to write unit and integration tests, automate workflows, and manage CI/CD pipelines using GitLab.
Relevant Tools and Technologies: Java, Kotlin, Spring, JavaScript, TypeScript, Angular, SQL, Docker, Gitlab, Jenkins, JIRA, JUnit, Cucumber
Analyzed and created reports for an indoor skydiving company by generating data and tables using SQL and Power BI.
Developed an automated Excel template that saved 6 hours of manual work per week.
Designed and implemented a Power BI dashboard from scratch based on client specifications.
Worked on the MAC sublayer of the 5G NR protocol stack, focusing on Load-Balancing handovers in the 5G NR Network.
Developed simulation models in Python and analyzed the results using Numpy and Matplotlib.
Successfully demonstrated a 27% performance improvement in load balancing using a novel algorithm, compared to the base algorithm.

projects.name: FURIDA Web Application
projects.description: Developed a web application for an NGO to post latest news and upload project-related documents. Created an admin dashboard for the client to manage this content on the application. Implemented the REST API using Java and Spring Boot, and the frontend UI using Angular and TypeScript. Deployed the application on AWS EC2 using Docker and integrated PostgreSQL as the database.

awards.title: Postman Student Expert
awards.summary: Awarded by Postman, Inc. for completing training on building and testing API requests using Postman.

awards.title: Samsung SWC (Software Competency)
awards.summary: Cleared the software competency test hosted by Samsung at the end of their internship.
